Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'With the help of the Gray Ravens, I successfully defeated Camu.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I understood his purpose of existence, as well as mine...', 4: '1'}
{3: "â€”Deep within Kamui's memories trickled words unbeknownst to others.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though we disagreed and fought a lot, we also helped each other.'}
{3: 'You will continue onwards, to realize your ideals and your beliefs.'}
{3: '...And I will return to you, bearing your joy, your wrath.'}
{3: "I guess, having a nagging idiot around sometimes isn't such a bad thing."}
